Top 8 Romantic Getaways near Pune 

Tripotohttps://www.tripoto.com/
By Prateek Dham
194.6k
VIEWS
24 Likes
Save
Share
Copy Link

Valentine's Day is one day of the year when you don't mind splurging on yourselves, because it's one special day to remember for the rest of the year to come. Beautiful memories are made and sometimes new relationships are written amidst sublime surroundings.Make this day better by going a bit farther with your loved one; the bond will go further for sure.

Here are 8 amazing getaways near Pune to make this day extra special, together.

1. Radisson Resort & Spa, Alibaug

SPONSORED

This absolute stunner of a place will make for the best gift for your loved one this Valentine's Day.

How much: 9,500 onwardsDistance from Pune: 140 kms

2. The Machan, Lonavla

Lonavla is known for its romantic atmosphere to enable the lovers to have the best time, and The Machan makes it doubly sure.

SPONSORED

How much: 8,000 onwardsDistance from Pune: 65 kms

3. Whispering Palms Beach Resort, Candolim, Goa

If you needed another reason to go to Goa.

How much: 6,000 onwardsDistance from Pune: 430 kms

SPONSORED

4. Della Resorts, Khandala

This is a hidden gem sure to take your breath away.

How much: 9,000 onwardsDistance from Pune: 68 kms

5. Upper Deck Resorts, Thaurwadi

SPONSORED

This is a paradise amongst the hills, accentuating the experience for people in love.

How much: 18,000 onwardsDistance from Pune: 65 kms

6. Mercure, Lavasa

As soon as you enter the premises of this luxurious resort, you'd experience a Valentine's Day like no prior.

How much: 6,000 onwardsDistance from Pune: 65 kms

SPONSORED

7. Evershine Keys Prima Resort, Mahabaleshwar

This is breathtaking in every sense of the adjective. Visit it to believe it.

How much: 8,700 onwardsDistance from Pune: 120 kms

SPONSORED

8. Fortune Select Dasve, Lavasa

For all the umpteen dates that this resort has already witnessed, make yours the most special.

How much: 7,700 onwardsDistance from Pune: 57 kms

Alibaug

Made for love.

Lonavala

Designed by cupid.

Whispering Palms Beach Resort

An affair to remember.

Upper Deck Resort

Mercure Lavasa Hotel
